General.Name: Kennede Electronics MFG Co Ltd
General.Description: Kennede Electronics MFG. Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, production, and sale of fans, rechargeable lighting products, and electric kettles in China. The company offers electric fan, humidifier, air purifier, heater, camping lamp, kettle, big flashlight, health pot, table lamp, and electrical cigarette. It exports its products to the United States, Europe, Asia, Africa, and internationally. Kennede Electronics MFG. Co., Ltd.Electronics MFG. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Jiangmen, China.

1.Name: Huiling  Liang
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
